data.text: @nessa_undreza There are two people in a relationship, sometimes they work well but other times the road is bumpy to say the least. To try putting blame in either one is sad. I’m glad you have moved forward with your life and grown.💌 https://t.co/ArVz9aJPQw
@nessa_undreza Pauly is right. You are amazing
@nessa_undreza So are you tho..I don’t think you give yourself enough credit for the courage and strength you’ve shown and continue to show..your a pretty amazing person you kno 💯❤️
@nessa_undreza You didn’t fail the relationship failed. Big difference, take time now for you and your boys.

Which comes to the following question, if I’m all these things (in the main, bc I’m far from perfect - and ain’t a saint)… why on earth have I ‘failed’ at these committed relationships??

To be continued…
